c74object.name: fl.gaussian~
c74object.digest: Generates frames of gaussian distributed random values.
c74object.description: The size of the output is dependent on the mode. The mean and standard deviation of the values are determined by the input values. The output size may either be set as a parameter, or be set to match that of the triggering input.

entry.name: 0. /mode [enum]
entry.description:
Controls how the output length is determined: requested - the output frame size is set by the length parameter. input - the output frame size will match the input size.
[0] - requested [1] - input

entry.name: 1. /length [int]
entry.description: Sets the length of the output when the mode is set to requested. Set in the units specified by the units parameter.

entry.name: 2. /units [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the units for specified output lengths.
[0] - samples [1] - ms [2] - seconds
